thread.title: MusicNews | Listen: 'Yeezer', a musical mash-up of Weezer & Kanye West, is actually genius
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Listen: 'Yeezer', a musical mash-up of Weezer & Kanye West, is actually genius - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | Listen: 'Yeezer', a musical mash-up of Weezer & Kanye West, is actually genius
text:
Given the similarity in their names, it was only a matter of time before it happened - but we're still surprised that it works so well.
Someone with altogether too much time on their hands has created a musical mash-up of indie-rock band Weezer 's music and rapper Kanye West aka Yeezy's lyrics, and the resultant album - dubbed ' Yeezer' - is doing the rounds today.
It sees song titles like ' The Buddy Holly Workout Song' and 'Bound 2 Smile' , and mash-ups of Weezer's 'Beverly Hills' with West's ' Through the Wire ' (' Through the Hills') , ' Island in the Sun' with 'American Boy' (' American Island' ) and more.
Our favourite? It's gotta be that grungey mix of 'Say It Ain't So' with West's ' Power' on the brilliant ' (And They) Say It Ain't So.'
Hear the whole Yeezer album below:
Via Mashable
